description: This file is a shell script responsible for downloading a package, managing retries, and handling codebig and direct download logic within a firmware or device management system. It includes functions for checking block status, generating download URLs, sending HTTP requests, and executing the download process with retry and blocking mechanisms.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage instructions for the script

methods.name: IsDirectBlocked
methods.description: Checks if direct download is currently blocked based on last failure timestamp

methods.name: IsCodeBigBlocked
methods.description: Checks if codebig download is currently blocked based on last failure timestamp

methods.name: getCodebigUrl
methods.description: Generates a codebig URL with appropriate signing and authorization headers

methods.name: generateDownloadUrl
methods.description: Prepares the curl command to download the specified file, possibly using codebig

methods.name: sendAppDownloadRequest
methods.description: Executes the curl command to download the package and logs the result

methods.name: applicationDownload
methods.description: Main download process handling retries, codebig usage, and failures
